pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, September 28, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

9:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a livestream conversation as part of the Leaders Event for Nature and People, a side event to the United Nations General Assembly. The event will be livestreamed at: https://www.learningfornature.org/en/topic/session-1-a-global-response-to-our-planetary-emergency-protecting-our-safety-net/.
